While very sensitive to the least blame in regard to their own course, many are too severe in dealing with those whom they suppose to be in error. No one was ever reclaimed from a wrong position by censure and reproach; but many are thus driven further from the right path and led to harden their hearts against 
                                                                           520
conviction. A spirit of kindness, a courteous, forbearing deportment may save the erring and hide a multitude of sins.
